snippet: Two senior executives at JPMorgan Chase, Irene Tse and Barry Zubrow, are expected to leave by the end of the year, in the latest round of management reshuffling after the bank’s multibillion-dollar trading loss.
abstract: Two senior executives at JPMorgan Chase, Irene Tse and Barry Zubrow, are expected to leave by the end of the year, in the latest round of management reshuffling after the bank’s multibillion-dollar trading loss.

headline.main: After Huge Trading Loss, JPMorgan Continues to Revamp
